lead_paragraph: Likened to the American candidate Donald J. Trump, the front-runner to be the archipelago’s next president has drawn criticism for his words against women, and against Pope Francis.

byline.contributor: Floyd Whaley reported from Davao City, and Adeel Hassan from New York. Jeffrey Marcus contributed reporting from New York.
byline.original: By FLOYD WHALEY and ADEEL HASSAN

headline.print_headline: Leading in Philippines After a Provocative Run
headline.main: Rodrigo Duterte, Philippines Presidential Contender, Likened to Donald Trump

snippet: Likened to the American candidate Donald J. Trump, the front-runner to be the archipelago’s next president has drawn criticism for his words against women, and against Pope Francis.
abstract: Unofficial results of 2016 Philippines presidential election show Rodrigo Duterte, mayor of southern city of Davao who has drawn wide criticism for his off-color comments, with substantial lead.
